name: Jotpress
overview:
Jotpress provides a free and secure community for anyone to share their content with the world, in the simplest way possible, using their email. You can publish random thoughts, essays, anecdotes, pictures, political views, hobbies, music, reviews, current events, announcements, how-to’s, youtube videos, resumes â€“ anything you want to share, by easily emailing them to Jotpress.

Email is the most pervasive online tool, and is used by nearly all 1.8 billion internet users. Currently, only 30% of these internet users write content on the web using blogs, social networks and their own web sites. However, by emailing to Jotpress, everyone can easily write on the web. Jotpress will take the content of the email and post it on the web. Jotpress is extremely simple to use, and it derives its flexibility and power from the familiar, simple email interface. Thus, using Jotpress can be equally effective by a web novice and an expert.

Jotpress also combines some of the best qualities of a blogging platform and a social community, making it a versatile tool for general web publishing and staying connected with your group. You can follow other Jotpress users, and others can start following you. Jotpress does not restrict your postings with just your friends, but allows you to be part of the World Wide Web. By using email, Jotpress does not impose any size limit on how long your posts are â€“ it can be a few words or a long essay â€“ it is up to you.

Jotpress is a community for everyone to easily have a voice on the web and a destination to see what others are saying.

milestones.source_description: Jotpress.com - An Alternative Way To Blog
JotPress: Making It Easier To Share Content On The Web Easier
